definition: lit. warp and weft in weaving; vertically and horizontal/length and breadth/criss-crossed/able to move unhindered/abbr. for 合縱連橫|合纵连横[He2 zong4 Lian2 heng2], School of Diplomacy during the Warring States Period (475-221 BC)
warp (the vertical threads in weaving)/vertical/longitudinal/north-south (lines of longitude)/lengthwise/to release/to indulge/even if

horizontal/across/crosswise/horizontal stroke (in Chinese characters)/to place (sth) flat (on a surface)/to cross (a river, etc)/in a jumble/chaotic/(in fixed expressions) harsh and unreasonable/violent
to criss-cross/to run unhindered across the whole country
School of Diplomacy of the Warring States Period (475-221 BC) whose leading advocates were Su Qin 蘇秦|苏秦[Su1 Qin2] and Zhang Yi 張儀|张仪[Zhang4 Yi2]
tears and mucus flowing profusely/sniveling/in a tragic state

sentences.english: Analysis of harmonic response of unconstrained damped plate based on randomness of viscoelastic damping layer;
sentences.chinese: 本文用谐波增量平衡法分析纵横向耦合梁的谐波响应。

sentences.english: Hopson Dongjiao Villa, Cross the Longdong Avenue , .
sentences.chinese: 合生东郊别墅，纵横龙东大道。

sentences.english: Broad boulevards are unimpeded by traffic in the new district, called Kangbashi New Area.
sentences.chinese: 宽阔的马路畅通无阻的纵横在名叫康巴什的新城。

sentences.english: Dad really stood up, holding his daughter career.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸真的站起来了，他抱着女儿老泪纵横。

sentences.english: Sometimes, it was given in a tender rain of tears, and then it was 'Take me to her.
sentences.chinese: 有时却是涕泗纵横，一片深情地说，“带我去看她。”

sentences.english: Iron-deficiency anemia can lead to a pale color along with a thin, brittle, ridged texture.
sentences.chinese: 缺铁性贫血会导致苍白的颜色和薄，脆，纵横条纹。

sentences.english: 1a Read the clues and complete the crossword.
sentences.chinese: 根据所给的线索，完成纵横字谜。

sentences.english: The city is criss-crossed with canals.
sentences.chinese: 这座城市里运河纵横交错。

sentences.english: Descent: Freespace is a new chapter in space dogfight sims.
sentences.chinese: 《纵横太空》开创了太空格斗模拟游戏的新篇章。

sentences.english: Best of all, you get 14 days to play Elite Japan Crossword for free.
sentences.chinese: 最妙的是，您在14天内，以发挥精英日本纵横免费。

sentences.english: It’s only a crossword puzzle that helps increase my vocabulary.
sentences.chinese: 这只是可以帮助我提高单词量的一种纵横字谜。

sentences.english: I've finished the crossword apart from 3 across and 10 down.
sentences.chinese: 这份纵横字谜除横3竖10以外我都填完了。

sentences.english: The crisscross inlet and outlet holes make various types of lamp routing possible.
sentences.chinese: 设有纵横两个方向的进出线口，适合多种布灯方案。

sentences.english: Look closely, a horizontal rail in front of me.
sentences.chinese: 放眼望去，一条条铁路纵横在我眼前。

sentences.english: Crisscross paths on a farmland fields, a bright yellow.
sentences.chinese: 阡陌纵横的田野，一片金黄灿烂。

sentences.english: Track and column is one of efficiency methods of 3 D braiding.
sentences.chinese: 纵横步进编织是制备三维预形件的有效方法之一。

definition: to criss-cross/to run unhindered across the whole country
to sweep everything before one/to be invincible (idiom)
to go on the rampage/to riot/to run amuck
to be swept by the wind/to be blown about by the wind/to be routed (in battle etc)
Wanli township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
lit. warp string in weaving/fig. vertical or north-south lines/to pass through/to cross lengthwise/to pierce (esp. north-south or top-to-bottom)
